hero.hello: Hi, I'm Alex â€” Fullstack Web-developer

about.p: Hi, I'm Alex, a passionate self-motivated web developer. I'm proficient with React, Express.js, and MongoDB. I've used my creativity and problem-solving skills to design and implement websites for clients.

projects.days: Days is a full-stack journaling application. It features rich text formatting, adding tags to the notes and authenticating users.
projects.store: Alex Store is a Full-Stack clothing store built with React, Express, and MongoDB. The store allows users to browse, add, and remove items from a cart and add them to favourites.
projects.portfolio: Portfolio is a web application for my personal website, showcasing my skills and projects as a full-stack web developer.
projects.doers: This is a simple, responsive ToDo List app created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The app allows users to create projects and tasks, set task priorities and due dates, and mark tasks as completed.
